snippet.title: Steal It Gameplay trailer
snippet.description:
Steal It is an online multiplayer game in which there are owners and thieves. Owners and thieves try to collect as many coins as possible in a certain amount of time. The team with the most coins at the end wins.

The players run around in a world and complete tasks. By completing a task, the players receive coins. More or less depending on the difficulty. Meanwhile, the thieves have to mingle with the crowd and try to steal from the other players. If the players know who one of the thieves is, they have the option of locking him up.

Steal It Demo will be released on July 4, 2024

Steal It is available on Steam and Epic Games Store
